thread.title: Delays between Newport and Cardiff train stations
thread.title_full: Delays between Newport and Cardiff train stations | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Delays between Newport and Cardiff train stations
text:
There are delays to trains between Newport and Cardiff Central after a vehicle struck a bridge, causing congestion.
There are delays of up to 20 minutes between Newport and Cardiff Central (pictured) train stations. Credit: Benjamin Wright/PA Wire National Rail @nationalrailenq Follow Delays between Newport and #Cardiff Central expected until 17:00 #RWC2015 #WALvFJI http://t.co/QivazPJ2Ba
16:00 - 1 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite National Rail says there are delays of up to 20 minutes, with disruption expected to continue until around 5pm.
More: Major disruption to train route between Swansea and London
Last updated Thu 1 Oct 2015 Travel Cardiff Newport South Wales
